posts.title: A kind of post
posts.content: Did the Death-Light Robbery quest for Charon and ended up picking the wrong perpetrator. My mistake was using the evidence presented and applying my real-world bias towards politicians so it seemed like a no-brainer. Sorry bro. I did decide everyone should get passage though and felt it it was only right that he get the first ride. Had no idea where to take him so I sailed to the Pillars of the Dead and placed him there.

posts.title: Another post
posts.content: I beat this game 4 times now (Including the dlcs and litterlly everything with both characters) and just wanted to say that this game is such a fucking masterpiece, every single detail of the world is just so well made and polished, The story is unique, The combat and skills are amazing, The open world feels endless with mystery and adventure, Every town and city is detailed, One of the most beautiful games I ever played (And I'm saying this as I also played the old school ac games) I don't know how anyone could possibly hate this game The more posts I see about this lovely masterpiece, the more I consider yet another run. A lot of people hate it because “It StEpS OuT Of ThE AC LoRe”… (yes, I’ve read that multiple times from multiple people as if they were programmed robots copying one another) and basically refuse to accept that the game is great and one of the best. Every play through I have done, I can’t really find anything bad to say about this game. I like Shadows but if you line it up with the other recent titles like Origins, Valhalla & Mirage… Odyssey still beats them in my opinion.
